options.query: sourcetype=sast_scan_detail* FalsePositive=False | table ProjectName, NodeFileName, VulnerabilityId, SimilarityId, QueryName, QueryGroup, QueryLanguage, QuerySeverity, _time | sort 0 - _time | stats count(VulnerabilityId) as recurrence by ProjectName, QueryName, QuerySeverity, NodeFileName | where recurrence > 1
